python.name: Python
python.readme_template:
# Python Project

## Description
A Python project.

## Installation
```bash
pip install -r requirements.txt
```

## Usage
```bash
python main.py
```

## Virtual Environment
```bash
python -m venv venv
source venv/bin/activate  # On Windows: venv\Scripts\activate
pip install -r requirements.txt
```

# Android Project

## Description
An Android application project.

## Requirements
- Android Studio
- Android SDK
- Java/Kotlin

## Setup
1. Open the project in Android Studio
2. Sync Gradle files
3. Run the application

## Build
```bash
./gradlew assembleDebug
```

laravel.name: Laravel
laravel.readme_template:
# Laravel Project

## Description
A Laravel PHP framework application.

## Requirements
- PHP >= 8.1
- Composer
- MySQL/PostgreSQL
- Node.js & NPM (for frontend assets)

## Installation
```bash
# Clone the repository
git clone [repository-url]
cd [project-name]

# Install dependencies
composer install
npm install

# Environment setup
cp .env.example .env
php artisan key:generate

# Database setup
php artisan migrate
php artisan db:seed
```

## Usage
```bash
# Start development server
php artisan serve

# Compile assets
npm run dev
# or for production
npm run build
```

## Testing
```bash
php artisan test
```

flutter.name: Flutter
gitignore: # Android Studio will place build artifacts here
flutter.readme_template:
# Flutter Project

## Description
A Flutter mobile application.

## Requirements
- Flutter SDK
- Dart SDK
- Android Studio / VS Code
- Android SDK (for Android development)
- Xcode (for iOS development, macOS only)

## Getting Started
```bash
# Get Flutter dependencies
flutter pub get

# Run the app
flutter run

# For specific platform
flutter run -d android
flutter run -d ios
```

## Build
```bash
# Build APK (Android)
flutter build apk

# Build iOS (macOS only)
flutter build ios

# Build for web
flutter build web
```

## Testing
```bash
# Run tests
flutter test

# Run integration tests
flutter drive --target=test_driver/app.dart
```

## Project Structure
- `lib/` - Main Dart code
- `test/` - Unit and widget tests
- `android/` - Android-specific code
- `ios/` - iOS-specific code
- `web/` - Web-specific code

fastapi.name: FastAPI
fastapi.description: Modern Python API with Alice architecture patterns
fastapi.readme_template:
# üíú FastAPI Project - Alice Architecture

## Description
A modern FastAPI application with Alice's signature development patterns.

## Features
- ‚ö° FastAPI for high performance
- üîÑ Async/await support
- üìä Automatic API documentation
- üîê JWT Authentication
- üóÑÔ∏è SQLAlchemy ORM
- ‚úÖ Pytest testing

## Installation
```bash
# Create virtual environment
python -m venv venv
source venv/bin/activate  # Windows: venv\Scripts\activate

# Install dependencies
pip install -r requirements.txt
```

## Development
```bash
# Run development server
uvicorn main:app --reload

# Run tests
pytest

# API Documentation
# http://localhost:8000/docs
```

## Deployment
```bash
# Production server
gunicorn main:app -w 4 -k uvicorn.workers.UvicornWorker
```

üíú *Built with Alice's modern Python patterns*

nextjs.name: Next.js
nextjs.description: React framework with TypeScript - Alice preferred stack
nextjs.readme_template:
# ‚ú® Next.js Project - Alice Edition

## Description
A modern Next.js application with TypeScript and Alice's preferred development patterns.

## Features
- ‚ö° Next.js 14+ with App Router
- üî∑ TypeScript for type safety
- üíú Tailwind CSS for styling
- üîÑ API Routes
- üì± Responsive design
- ‚öôÔ∏è ESLint & Prettier

## Getting Started
```bash
# Install dependencies
npm install
# or
yarn install

# Run development server
npm run dev
# or
yarn dev
```

## Available Scripts
```bash
# Development
npm run dev

# Build for production
npm run build

# Start production server
npm start

# Linting
npm run lint

# Type checking
npm run type-check
```

## Project Structure
- `app/` - App Router pages and layouts
- `components/` - Reusable UI components
- `lib/` - Utility functions and configurations
- `public/` - Static assets

üíú *Built with Alice's modern React patterns*

alice-portfolio.name: Alice Portfolio
alice-portfolio.description: Alice signature portfolio template with glassmorphism
alice-portfolio.readme_template:
# üíú Alice Portfolio Project

## Description
A beautiful portfolio website featuring Alice's signature glassmorphism design and modern development patterns.

## Features
- ‚ú® Glassmorphism UI design
- üíú Alice purple color scheme
- üì± Fully responsive
- ‚ö° Fast loading animations
- üé® Creative project showcases
- üîÑ Smooth transitions
- üìä Project analytics
- üíé Modern CSS effects

## Tech Stack
- HTML5/CSS3 with modern features
- JavaScript ES6+
- CSS Grid & Flexbox
- Glassmorphism effects
- Progressive Web App features

## Getting Started
```bash
# Clone and setup
git clone [repository-url]
cd alice-portfolio

# Install dependencies (if using build tools)
npm install

# Development server
npm start
# or open index.html directly
```

## Customization
- Edit `css/colors.css` for color scheme
- Modify `js/portfolio-data.js` for project content
- Update `assets/` folder with your project images
- Customize glassmorphism effects in `css/glass-effects.css`

## Deployment
- Deploy to any static hosting (Netlify, Vercel, GitHub Pages)
- Ensure all assets are optimized
- Test glassmorphism effects across browsers

‚ú® *Alice's signature portfolio template - where art meets code* üíú
